actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Favorable Executive Comment Received From FCC.

official_title: A bill to require emergency position indicating radio beacons on uninspected United States fishing, fish processing, and fish tender vessels.

summary.text: Amends the safety equipment requirements for uninspected U.S. fishing vessels to require that each uninspected fishing, fish processing, or fish tender vessel operating on the high seas be equipped with the prescribed number and type of emergency position indicating radio beacons.

titles.title: A bill to require emergency position indicating radio beacons on uninspected United States fishing, fish processing, and fish tender vessels.
